What are the age requirements for Child.answer: A school aged child is a child who is either: in school, including being home schooled. 6 or older.

Does child care subsidy cover preschool?.answer: The Child Care Subsidy can be backdated up to 28 days prior to the date the Child Care Subsidy claim was submitted or 2 July 2018, whichever is later. After you have completed all of the above steps in MyGov, it will take about two weeks for the system to produce your eligible subsidy level.

Can I pay a relative for child care?.answer: Yes. Families are entitled to receive Child Care Subsidy for up to 42 allowable absence days per child, per financial year. ... Your child is attending preschool.
